# 找到每个数对的对应的X的0变区间、1变区间、2变区间
# 最终X对应的变数和的最小值就是结果
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        hn = n // 2
        x_update = [0 for i in range(k+2)]
        for i in range(hn):
            a, b = nums[i], nums[-1-i]
            a, b = min(a, b), max(a, b)
            zero = b - a
            onemax = max(k - a, b)
            # 0变区间[zero, zero], 1变区间[0, onemax], 其余都是2变区间；0变区间在1变区间内
            x_update[0] += 1
            x_update[zero] -= 1
            x_update[zero+1] += 1
            x_update[onemax+1] += 1
        res = inf
        cur = 0
        for i in range(k+1):
            cur += x_update[i]
            res = min(res, cur)
        return res
